game.seaterror2: You don't have enough money to take a seat.
game.details_blackjack: Live Blackjack - The fastest live dealer Blackjack in the world. Same deal speed as if you were in a real Casino.
game.details_blackjack_vip: VIP Blackjack - Play live Blackjack with other high rollers
game.details_blackjack_betbehind: Play behind Blackjack. Bet on other players. When they win, you win !
game.details_baccarat: Enjoy live Baccarat in the environment it is meant to be played in.
game.details_baccarat_vip: live dealer VIP baccarat, a chance to play with high stakes.
game.details_roulette: Play standard Roulette with one game per minute.
game.details_roulette_vip: VIP Roulette. Play VIP Roulette with one game every minute. High betting limits for high rollers
game.details_roulette_blue: Play our brand new Grand Roulette with your favourite presenters. Fast and interactive. Open 6 PM till 12 PM (GMT) every day.
game.details_roulette_european: Play LIVE and experience the truest Live Roulette available online. Place your bets and speak to our lovely croupiers amongst the best graphics online everyday between 6pm and 12am (GMT)!
game.details_roulette_auto: Fully automated Roulette wheel produced by Cammegh, The World's Finest Roulette Wheel.
game.details_roulette_brown: Spinning every 45 seconds, our fully air powered Roulette wheel is the fastest live roulette in the world! Play jet Roulette with the table limit ranging from 0.25 right up to 500 every hour of every day!.
game.bonusterms:
You are eligible for a *BONUS_CURRENCY* *BONUS_AMOUNT* *BONUS_NAME* bonus!

Amount will be added to your bonus account, if you accept the following terms:

BONUS AGREEMENT:

ACCEPTING THIS BONUS OF *BONUS_CURRENCY* *BONUS_AMOUNT* SIGNIFIES THAT YOU ACCEPT THE OBLIGATION TO PLACE AT LEAST *BONUS_CURRENCY* *MIN_BET* IN BETS ON APPROVED GAMES BEFORE CASHING OUT ANY FUNDS. THIS REQUIREMENT WILL BE ENFORCED BY OUR ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT ACCORDING TO THE BONUS AGREEMENT.

game.betbehind_info: If a player you are betting on chooses to split or double down, your stake will be doubled. If you DO NOT want to double your stake in these circumstances, please UNCHECK the boxes below.
game.betbehind_note: Note: If you bet on a player who chooses not to place a bet, your stake will be returned to you.
